title: Origin - Robert Langdon (Hardback)

title: Fire and Fury: Inside the Trump White House (Hardback)
description: “Michael Wolff is a total loser who made up stories in order to sell this really boring and untruthful book.” - Donald Trump

title: Birdcage Walk (Paperback)
description: ‘Like all great writers who pass too young, her readers will long for the books that might have been but alongside these regrets lies a gratitude for a life spent in literature and the wonderful books that she gave us over a quarter of a century of dedicated and prolific writing.’ – John Boyne
author: Harsh V
